## ruleClonerPlugin variable

A dummy PostCSS plugin that clones any rule with the selector `to-clone` to a new rule with the selector `cloned`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
ruleClonerPlugin: {
    postcssPlugin: string;
    prepare(): Plugin;
}
```
